resources.string: AboutAppDevLib is a library to build easily a fully featured About section for your app. With a few lines of code you can create a screens with info about you, your app and third party libraries used.
Example with two fixed tabs using AboutAppFragment and AboutDevFragment
Example with 4 scrollable tabs in which the last one is the same Fragment used in the Home section
Example without tabs that show a simple developer info screen builded with AboutDevFragment
Example that change the default colors used in the rest of examples
Please, take a look to AboutAppDevLib Demo:\n%s
Thanks to the people who send me their ideas and comments to improve this lib.

v1.1.4: Tu.3-Apr-2018
* Added support for HTML in custom CardView widgets
* Fixed minor bugs

v1.1.2: Su.1-Apr-2018
* Updated third party libraries
* Changed ImageViews for Views in layout dividers
* Added screenshots to README file
* Fixed minor bugs

v1.1.0: Fr.16-Mar-2018
* Added support for Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)

v1.0.0: Th.15-Mar-2018
* First public release of sample demo app at Google Play
* Source code published at GitHub

v0.1.8: We.14-Mar-2018
* First beta release
An advanced alarm app with cloud sync between your devices
The ultimate alarm clock for your nightstand
The definitive app for calculating Texas Hold\'em poker stats & odds
The evolution of the classic sliding blocks puzzle game
This app uses the following third-party libraries. Thanks to its developers for their great work.
An easy to use library to build About screens for your apps
The flexible, easy to use, all in one drawer library for your Android project
Simple, pretty and powerful logger for android
A memory leak detection library for Android and Java
Yes, this screen is built using AboutFaqFragment.Builder class. The answers have been created with FaqCardView widget
Yes, you can clone or download AboutAppDevLib source code from https://github.com/ej3dev/AboutAppDevLib
What is the Answer to the Ultimate Question of Life, The Universe, and Everything?
What is the most popular text paragraph for designers?
